item.title: 🟡 23:14 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 23:14 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
